snippet.title: NFL PRO ERA – Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
YOU ARE QB1 in NFL PRO ERA, the first-ever officially licensed NFL football game in virtual reality (VR). Available now on Meta Quest 2. Playstation VR version coming soon.

http://ocul.us/3dcjEsp
 
Strap on your shoulder pads and step under center as QB1 of your favorite NFL team. Experience the rush of running out of the tunnel, taking the field and leading your team to victory. Play through full seasons as any of the 32 NFL teams and compete to win the Super Bowl. Step into multiplayer mode to compete in (3) exciting games, hang out with friends or play catch.
 
Test your skills in the fast-paced 2-Minute Drill, an arcade-style experience where you try to score as many TDs as possible. Fantasy Style scoring rewards you for how you play and a global leaderboard keeps track of who is the best of the best. 

Welcome to the future of the field.

Surround Sound – J.I.D. (ft. 21 Savage & Baby Tate)
